name: House of Loki
description:
When fate comes knocking with a hammer and sword, will you be able to break the chains of destiny?

This is a tale of prose and prophecy inspired by the Eddas of Norse Mythology. This is not a retelling, but an exploration of what is unsaid, guided by your actions. Immerse yourself in the cold winters of Jotunheimr and see the world from the perspective of those who would destroy it.

I recommend closing the default twine sidebar by clicking the top left "<" sign, or playing in full screen.

FEATURES
Branching paths
Contextual inventory and crafting

Written and drawn by Alex Kubodera: https://twitter.com/KeiKube

If there is enough interest in this project, a part 2 is planned.
